dosing_details: After informed consent was obtained, subjects abstained from caffeine-containing products for 48 hours before and during the period of the study. Subjects were provided with caffeinefree beverages during this period. Each study participant received the combination of 100 mg caffeine, 20 mg omeprazole, 25 mg losartan, 30 mg dextromethorphan (as an oral liquid), and an oral dose of 2 mg midazolam (in 5% dextrose solution). Venous blood samples (10 mL) were collected before administration of the cocktail and at 1-, 2-, 4-, and 6-hour postadministration.
